title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of students, with a total of 11 data points.
Overall Number of students has increased over the Year
Number of students is slightly constant from 2008 to 2018.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2009 and 2010.
Max Number of students about 150608.0 was recorded at Year 2017
Min Number of students about 118217.0 was recorded at Year 2008
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of students, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2008 to 2013.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2014 to 2017.
Also, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2017 to 2018.
Differently, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2013 to 2014.
